Articles.Content: Ive made this Grabble crane truck that works pretty awesome. The outriggers hold the truck off the ground and kept planted and you can swing out and telescope/extend the boom and its also loaded with lights. Youll need to press U and H to get both vehicle and crane lights to work. I have the controls preset and named accordingly. Download the truck below the pictures.
Please, please post the packs needed. From what I see, you need Probodobodyne, Bigtrak, Damned Robotics, and Carts.

Sorry im newb on the forum part of ksp. I figured if the truck was downloadable the parts would come with it. Yea it does use damned robotics, probodobodyne, hstwcart pack. Hell i just pool my parts together in the game i dont keep track. sorry

This thing is awesome.

That said, if there are mod-exclusive parts that can be removed that would reduce the number of mods required, yet not prevent the craft from functioning, removing them would be a good idea. People would rather not have to download too many mods.

It uses hardly three packs that just about everyone uses. I see no problem in it, and some of my earlier ships had 5+ mods in it.

EDIT:, four packs, sorry. But still.

I have analysed and narrowed the craft parts into Damned robotics, Nova\'s Probodobodyne, and the cart mod. The only remaining parts that are left are 'kerbablCapsule, lateralcouplerR, lateraltricoupler'. The couplers are from either from the alpha or beta novapunch I think. But for the capsule I have no idea.

If anyone can recognize the parts in the bed of the truck in either one of the pictures that would be great.

Thanks shogun that was pretty neat for you to do that. the picture is old i need to update it. I have switched the capsule from the 'soyuz' rocket to the bare stock capsule that has came WITH the game. You are correct the bigtrak lights are with it. Ive gotten so much into modding on this game i have never foreseen the problems with trying to share them on the community but you guys are helping me out with that and im learning it. Thanks again Ill see about switching out the pictures here in a bit to what the new .craft is.

Unless my program is faulty, this should be the complete list of packs and parts (of the new truck.craft).

DamnedRobotics

==============

DRarmtruss1

DRrotatron

DRhinge1

DRcylinder1

DRclaw

DRarmtruss2

hstwCart132

===========

hstwTruck

KSP_Bigtrak_v.21

================

KSP Bigtrak Flood Light

NovaPunch1_0alpha

=================

lateraltricoupler

SPparachuteadapter

KSP-Default parts

===============

mk1pod
